title: What Innovation Means for European Companies
content:
Updated: 7:12 a.m. Tuesday, Sept. 29, 2015 | Posted: 11:00 a.m. Tuesday, Sept. 29, 2015 

Inc.com 

Europe lacks collective scale, it is partitioned, rigid and multi-local. The only way to scale in the European market is through innovation and senior staff flexibility. 

Read full story
